name: Validating the route search results

If search provider name is "GOOGLE" then triggered value should be "10"

steps.name: User call "GET" https request for "/v2/routes/search" with String "sfai" and type as "FROM"
Results should contain "SFHospital" and "SF Airport"

elements.name: Verify if user is able to purchase a shuttl pass

steps.name: Given user call "POST" https request for "/v4/subPlan/buySubscriptionPaymentMethods" for selected subscription
User call "GET" https request for "/v3/wallet/balance" for shuttl wallet
User call "POST" https request for "/v4/subPlan/buy" with body
I should see the message "Successfully Purchased Shuttl Pass" in response

elements.name: Verify if user is able to cancel his purchased pass

steps.name: User call "GET" https request for "/v3/sub/getRefundCategories" with query params as userSubscription
User call "Post" https request for "/v3/sub/refundSubscription" with userSubscription & reasonid
I should see the refund success message "The refund amount has been transferred to your wallet/account that was used for the transaction." in response

arguments.val: "The refund amount has been transferred to your wallet/account that was used for the transaction."
